mapper.sql: id, task_id, company_id, phone_num, uid, remark, status, stage, create_time, extra_info
mapper.delete: delete from t_manual where id = #{id} AND company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_manual (id, task_id, company_id, phone_num, uid, remark, stage, status, create_time, extra_info) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{extra_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_manual
id,
task_id,
company_id,
phone_num,
uid,
remark,
stage,
`status`,
create_time,
extra_info,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uid, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stage, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
now(),
#{extraInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_manual
task_id = #{taskId},
company_id = #{companyId},
phone_num = #{phoneNum},
uid = #{uid},
remark = #{remark},
stage = #{stage},
`status` = #{status},
extra_info= #{extraInfo},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
